title: Updated Chic Community! High End Finishes! ATTACHED GARAGE!
posting_body: Our community offers one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes.
Each updated apartment features fully-equipped kitchens, washer and dryer hookups, generous storage space, and walk-in closets.
Our apartments have an open design layout, allowing for any type or size of furniture.
Some homes also include fireplaces, attached garages, attached yards, and/or sunrooms as an extension to your living room.
As part of our community, relax by our crystalline swimming pool and outdoor kitchen that includes both charcoal and gas grills.
Our game room offers a pool table, kitchen, TV, and more for you to entertain your friends and family.
Our newly renovated clubhouse amenities include our 24-hour fitness studio, steam room, dry sauna, and business center.
Our community is controlled access from the entry and as part of your trash fee, includes 5-day a week door side valet trash service.
Additional rentable options include washer/dryer sets, garages, and/or carports to make transitioning into your new apartment seamless.
Please Call Desiree with Dash Realty
